body.p:
Dixon Webster County Ky
April 9th 1864
To his excellency Gov. Thos E Bramlett
Dr Sir

I would respectfully represent to your excellency that at the May election 1863 myself and B F Davis were elected Justices for District No. 6 in this County I became a candidate for the Clerkship and did not qualify and B F Davis also failed to qualify.

consequently those offices are vacant in that district. and at the request of a number of citizens of that district I would recommend to your favorable consideration N. D. Martin as a suitable person to fill one of said vancies Mr Martin is a Union man and loyal to his Government

Repsectfully Yours
M C Davis Clerk
of Webster County Court

Webster Co
J. P
N. D. Martin
apptd
14th Apl/64
